English: Zhang Yi (c. 3rd century), literary figure from Wei of the Three Kingdoms, other name `稚~`讓~|`稚~让[Zhi4 rang4], named as compiler of earliest extant Chinese encyclopedia `廣雅~|`广~`雅~[Guang3 ya3] and several lost works

Zhang Yi (c. 3rd century), literary figure from Wei of the Three Kingdoms, other name `稚~`讓~|`稚~让[Zhi4 rang4], named as compiler of earliest extant Chinese encyclopedia `廣雅~|`广~`雅~[Guang3 ya3] and several lost works
